Name: SEI CERT Oracle Secure Coding Standard for Java - Guidelines 49. Miscellaneous (MSC)
Summary: Weaknesses in this category are related to the rules and recommendations in the Miscellaneous (MSC) section of the SEI CERT Oracle Secure Coding Standard for Java.

References.Title: SEI CERT Oracle Coding Standard for Java : Rule 49. Miscellaneous (MSC)
SEI CERT Oracle Coding Standard for Java : Rec 49. Miscellaneous (MSC)

MappingNotes.Rationale: This entry is a Category. Using categories for mapping has been discouraged since 2019. Categories are informal organizational groupings of weaknesses that can help CWE users with data aggregation, navigation, and browsing. However, they are not weaknesses in themselves.
MappingNotes.Comments: See member weaknesses of this category.
